item.title: Catwoman: Lonely City (2021 - 2022)
item.description: Catwoman: Lonely City #1 variant cover by Cliff Chiang Catwoman: Lonely City. Cliff Chiang. www.dc.com . www.hoopladigital.com . batman.fandom.com . 2021. aims to handle a Gotham without Batman. Maybe there’ll be fewer super-villains as there is no Batman. There’s an arms race between villains and heroes. I expect more systemic villains that skirt legality such that they can’t be imprisoned.
